meanings.definition: Of or relating to a preceptor
meanings.sent1: The preceptorial guidance helped the students understand the complex topic.
meanings.sent2: The students appreciated the preceptorial approach of their mentor.
meanings.sent3: The preceptorial advice was so helpful that even the shyest student spoke up in class.
meanings.sent4: Her preceptorial teaching style was like a guiding light for the confused students.
meanings.sent5: The preceptorial support was like a safety net for the learners.

meanings.definition: In the style of a preceptor
meanings.sent1: The preceptorial tone of the professor made the lecture engaging.
meanings.sent2: She adopted a preceptorial manner while explaining the concepts to the class.
meanings.sent3: The preceptorial outfit he wore made him look like a wise sage.
meanings.sent4: Her preceptorial gestures were clear and easy to follow.
meanings.sent5: The preceptorial aura around him made everyone respect his opinions.

meanings.definition: Involving or characteristic of a preceptor
meanings.sent1: The preceptorial duties required patience and understanding.
meanings.sent2: The preceptorial responsibilities included mentoring new employees.
meanings.sent3: The preceptorial meeting turned into a fun learning session.
meanings.sent4: Her preceptorial nature shone through in every interaction.
meanings.sent5: The preceptorial role was crucial in shaping the future professionals.
